alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 16 at 3:39AM AKDT until October 18 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island, Ketchikan Gateway Borough and Annette Island. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ex Typhoon Bolaven will move into the Gulf of Alaska Tuesday. While confidence on the track and strength is growing, there is still some uncertainty. Probability of gusts greater than or equal to 60 mph are greatest through the Southern Inner Channels, near 60 to 70% likelihood.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
